website_summaries.verdict: These invisible ink pens make great stocking stuffers for older kids who like novelty items or enjoy playing games that involve a bit of detective work.
pros: Mystifies kids with the invisible ink that can be seen with each pen's built-in light
A neat item for playing detective or spy games
You get 12 pens, so this is a great pick if you have lots of stockings to fill
cons: While the pens come in several colors, the color of the ink doesn't vary
Some packs had pens with dim or non-working lights, and the batteries aren't replaceable

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these "spy" pens for my son's 1st grade class for Halloween. I researched others. But, other's poor reviews with batteries dead, light did not work, or ink dried out; I chose this product. I always read reviews. ⭐💬 I pulled out the plastic tabs for all #24 ordered. I checked each one for ink & UV light. They ALL worked.!.!.! I tried to open battery compartment for child Safety, none openned. I also priced them per pen, and they were the cheapest for the best quality, so far. I have not given them to classmates, yet. Very happy with purchase after much research & effort. 😀👍👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: DJP

customer_reviews.title: Did I get a bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after buying a different brand, not realizing the other brand had cutesy animals all over them and these were favors for an 11-year-old boy’s birthday party. But these did not work AT ALL. Tried a few from the batch and they were extremely faint while still wet and completely invisible under the black light when dry. The cutesy animal ones worked great though. This product has very high reviews so I’m not sure what the problem was. Sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Music Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pens!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these pens, they work really well. My kids drew on themselves and no one got a rash. They drew on the walls and there is only one spot where the writing is visible, it must have something to do with the way the sunlight falls in that part of the room. I cleaned it off easily with a wet, soapy cloth, no problem. I will definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Harris

customer_reviews.title: REALLY Secret Santa
customer_reviews.text: I bought 36 of these, and every one worked. A+ for quality. I gave them to children ages 5 to 12. HUGE hit with all of them. I used these pens to write the names on the gift tags for Christmas morning. The nieces and nephews then used the lights to read the tags and "play Santa" by handing out the presents to everybody. They LOVED it. They got all kinds of expensive presents, including a hover board, but really these pens are what they played with most on Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: JudithTop Contributor: Jigsaw Puzzles

customer_reviews.title: A bargain of mystery
customer_reviews.text: My kids spotted a similar product at a similar price point recently. Only problem was that there were only two pens. So enter these SyPen's. They have been a big hit to my science loving kids who have very active imaginations. They love creating and being able to send secret notes via these pens. The youngest immediately took one outside to look for scorpions since it is a UV light. So really my only concern is kids shining these lights into eyes but that is a parenting issue.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Ink visible for >1 month after writing
customer_reviews.text: After receiving these, I wrote the current date on some scrap paper, occasionally, for over a month. The month-old writing is equally as visible as today's writing. People have asked how long the ink is visible before fading. I can't answer exactly, but I can say for sure it'll last at least 30 days. The markers themselves still work perfectly fine too, without drying up. These seem like great UV Pens.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my granddaughter's Escape the Room DIY birthday party. We hid the pens and some secret messages in a briefcase that was part of the clues and hints process to escape the room. The pens have worked great. My daughter previously wrote the messages (while I shone the light on the paper as she was writing so she could see what she was writing). The girls had a blast using them and each girl got to keep a pen as part of their party favor. Yes, I would order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim  N.

customer_reviews.title: Im a grown adult and I like um! LOL
customer_reviews.text: These pens are pretty awesome. They came on time and were exactly as expected. You write in clear ink and then the lil light on top "reveals: the message. I got these as party favors for my kids bday and I'm pretty sure they'll be a hit with kids of all ages cause I like umm too! lol I will try to update with pics and the kiddos thoughts soon. I gotta say though-for the price I think they're cool and worth it :)
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: What fun!
customer_reviews.text: Although we got these pens as a treat for grandkids, we did check one out to see if it "worked". The kids will love them! Write on anything (including skin) and it doesn't look like anything happened. Shine the light attached to the pen on what you wrote - magic - you can see it. Perfect for a stocking stuffer, or a treat bag at a birthday party - or to hand out for Halloween even.
customer_reviews.author: Diversified Data Solutions LLC

customer_reviews.title: not multi color
customer_reviews.text: The ink is definitely invisible. My kids enjoy them, lots of fun. the ink is absolutely invisible. I just wish the ink was different colors with the black light. the pens do not reflect the color of the ink, they're all the same color under the UV light.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L.

customer_reviews.title: Seller Quickly Replaced Defective Pens
customer_reviews.text: I bought the twelve pack and ten worked well but two were defective. I contacted the seller and they sent me replacements immediately without charging anything. So overall I am happy with the product and seller. For the two that were defective, in one the ink was dry and in the other the batteries were corroded. Besides that, these pens work very well. The invisible ink really is invisible and shines brightly once the UV light is on them.
customer_reviews.author: Incanus

customer_reviews.title: Secret messages are fun!
customer_reviews.text: The pen was a fun addition to the notebook cover that I made for the grandkids Christmas gifts. I wrote a note to each of them with the disappearing ink. I told them to read the message on the first page and they all said what note? It didn’t take them very long to figure out what the pen in the pencil case was for. A couple of the kids had already used such a pen in school. The message led them to their last gift. It made the gift that much more fun!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great spy pens but wish all were working...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I would give 5 stars if all were working. I bought them for class valentines and ordered 36 pens per reviews of some not working. 5 did not work in the 3 packages I received- 2 with dying batteries (light so weak couldn’t really see message), 1 with the light button broken (could be used if you have something to stick in the cap but I can’t give them as a valentine), 1 with the batteries not lined up (I can’t figure out a way to align them), and 1 totally dried out. Besides 13% of pens not working, these pens are great. I’m sure my son’s class will love them next month.
customer_reviews.author: L Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Gift for Future Detectives
customer_reviews.text: In all fairness, these pens have not been used for what they are intended for, yet. My little nephew is having a Scooby Doo Missing Pinata Themed Birthday Party! These pens are PERFECT for his little Mystery Crew- They are as promised in the product description so that is why I gave them the 5 stars. I will be really surprised if the children are disappointed with them- I think these are a perfect little gift for children who have imagination and a sense of adventure!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Garcia

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: These are FELT TIP MARKERS, not ball or gel point pens, that wasn’t clear. The ink is all a blue UV reflective color, not different colors that match the exterior color of the marker. The built in lights are weak, but all worked as expected out of the package. These work out to around $1 a marker, I’ve purchased different color UV ink markers before at $2-$3 each.
customer_reviews.author: The Zissou

customer_reviews.title: My kids loved them!
customer_reviews.text: My son saw a single of this type of pen at a book fair for 3 dollars. I immediately went on amazon and bought this set because of the price alone 12/$12. They can very quickly in a zip top bag. Each pen had a battery strip to keep the batteries from wearing out in transit. So far, these are a huge hit. We had a sleepover and there may or may not be a ton of messages written on my walls....What's really nice is that it washes off easily. We love them.
customer_reviews.author: audalon

customer_reviews.title: fun little gifts
customer_reviews.text: My sons love these pens. I used them as stocking stuffers and they really enjoy writing secret messages. You use the marker to write on the paper and the ink looks invisible. Then you push the button on the cap to illuminate a small flashlight, and the ink becomes visible, resembling a black light type effect. Fun little gifts!
customer_reviews.author: JessicaH

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Almost all of these arrived with the button broken off that you push to activate the light. My kids can push it without the button by sticking something small into the hole but that’s a pain and they shouldn’t have to. We’ve had other spy pens that were a smaller diameter and seemed to be of better quality. I wouldn’t purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: MamaH

customer_reviews.title: They work and they are cool
customer_reviews.text: Gave them away in a birthday party for 4th Grade. They work perfectly and the kids loved them. I wish each pen came with a separate wrap (instead of a couple of the same color in each wrap). I was very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, but fun for all the kids, teenagers included!
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews that said some of the pens didn't work when they arrived. We gave away 24 of them for different prizes and gifts this past Christmas, and to my knowledge, all of them worked. We gave these out to kids from age 7 to 19 around the holidays, and all of them thought they were great! Of course, you're not going to wow a teenager, but for about $1.00 a pen, it's a fun little gift or prize to give them.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Secret Pen Pal
customer_reviews.text: We are using these pens to write secret letters to friends and they are a huge hit. The children love writing and the pen lights up the ink great. So happy and will be suggesting this idea to others. It is a perfect activity for children that can't get out of the house but still want to stay in touch with their friends/family.
customer_reviews.author: WWeber

customer_reviews.title: Half of the pens did not work
customer_reviews.text: Half of the pens did not work after removing the battery tab. The pens did but not light that the kids need to see what was written. Very disappointed. I bought them for my class to use during an escape the classroom activity. It was a disaster....I was wondering why only some of the groups were using the lights. They thought their lights were not suppose to work while other groups were.
customer_reviews.author: jgordon

customer_reviews.title: Playful colors, bright light and good invisible ink.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome invisible ink pen markers. I use them for EDU breakouts and fun activities with high school students and my young nieces and nephews. So far they all work, and the ink is clearly visible. Just know that invisible ink pen markers often do not usually work on black paper. However, they work on other colored paper. Students love using them to find clues on papers. Make sure you place the cap on correctly so the ink doesn't dry out.
customer_reviews.author: SnowflakeL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: We bought them for my daughters spy equipment for her batgirl costume, since we’ve used them for silly sight words, scavenger hunt clues, and she’s given them to friends for secret message decoders st school. They’ve lasted a few months and we are very pleased. We would totally buy them again. And may end up with sets for nieces. I also love how tidy they have been. No visible mess :)
customer_reviews.author: Daria B. Kaval

customer_reviews.title: I Liked the SyPen Product
customer_reviews.text: Soon as I opened the Marker/Pens I was Gladly Surprised by the Company's Thoughtfulness :) !! A small battery protector kept the batteries from staying turned on constantly . I thought that was Great Thinking :) . Thanks SyPen for Your Product . I Look Forward to using these Pens more often in the Future . Plus it wouldn't hurt if You Added More into the container :) . Thank You .
customer_reviews.author: James Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our homeschool National Treasure history activity
customer_reviews.text: These pens are fantastic! We got these for a homeschooling activity with our kids. We picked up a US Constitution replica and wanted disappearing ink to make clues as we travelled to US history sites like in the movie National Treasure. The quality of these pens are better than expected. They write really well and stand out clearly when under the lights conviniently on the pens. Haven’t tested every individual pen but so far all of the pens and lights have functioned properly. These would be fun for party favors with kids and adults alike. You could use them for mystery games or escape rooms.
customer_reviews.author: CollinsAx

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter had a slumber party, and I knew I'd need something to keep the kids occupied....even after lights out. That's how slumber parties go. Every single one of these pens work. Nice and juicy ink, lights are all nice and bright. Does exactly what it says it does. It didn't take long for them to figure out they can write on themselves, as well. I gave them all matching color notebooks to go along with them. They had a lot of fun spying on each other, collecting clues, etc. If it helps, these were all 10 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Holly B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fun!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pens!! I hosted an escape party for my 12 yr old daughter and her friends and used these pens to draw hieroglyphics all over her room, which they then had to find and decipher. About half way through, the girls decided it was much more fun to draw their own designs on the walls (and on my son!). No worries here, it washes right off; but, even if it didn't, you can't see it without the light! Talk about fun! I sent each girl home with their own pen/light and they all said it was the best slumber party ever! Thanks for making such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Pens that Work!
customer_reviews.text: These pens were purchased as classroom prizes, and the kids LOVED them! I bought a different version of these pens a year ago from a different vendor, but these are much higher quality. They work equally well on white and colored paper. My son took them in to class, then proceeded to "buy back" about half of them to give to his friends who were not in on the prize day. The pens came on time, as promised, and they all worked. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Preston

customer_reviews.title: Super fun pens
customer_reviews.text: Bright colors (not the ink but the cute plastic pen). These work very well! I like the color variety. I was able to pass on to both boys and girls. These are a a HIT! “Ink” and light all work.
customer_reviews.author: SKV

customer_reviews.title: The kids' loved these!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our son's birthday party goodie bags. There were other items given in the bags but these were a HIT! They would write notes on one another's hand and on paper and then, shine the light to see what was written. Very fun! I will definitely buy these again for our daughter's birthday.
customer_reviews.author: PiTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Super fun, and a great deal.
customer_reviews.text: These little pens are amazing. I bought these as party favors and was pretty impressed. For the price they seem a great quality. I read a review that mentioned some were dead on arrival, so I tested all the caps before putting them in the gift bags and they all worked.
customer_reviews.author: monniewolf

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: My kids have been using a single pen constantly for about a week The pen has not run out of ink and the light still works. If I can get over a week's worth of use for one of the pens, I'm happy. They still have the other 10 to use after the first two wear out Also, this pen is the envy of all their friends.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Color does not show in light
customer_reviews.text: My son picked these out to give his dad for a birthday gift. The idea was they could write messages back and forth in secret to each other. We thought the color of the pens would mean that is the color shown when using the light. But it is just the simple blue light that has been used for decades. That being said, they are an excellent value for price! And they would be great gifts for a kids birthday party. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly McClish

customer_reviews.title: Great gifts!
customer_reviews.text: I am constantly looking for things for Christmas gifts for nieces and nephews. These pens have hit the right target! They are affordable and great for girls and boys. They all want to pretend to be spies or send secret messages. This is going to be fun for them!
customer_reviews.author: Cioppo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect favor for children and young people
customer_reviews.text: These invisible ink pens were a huge hit as prizes for young girls ranging in age from 3 to 13. We had a baby shower for a family member and included aunts, nieces, and young cousins. We played a team game based on recognizing nursery rhymes and the pens were prizes for the girls on the winning team. The pens were such a hit that we ended up giving all the young girls a pen as a "participation prize." The design is great. The invisible ink pen plus the pen's light that reveals the message is easy to use for all ages and provides lots of fun. I would definitely buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Useful for hotel sheets!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for housekeeping supervisors to have solid proof is a housekeeper is attempting to avoid changing sheets. I had my suspicions but I got my answers with these. Was able to replace some housekeepers. A couple of the lights were broken or weak but other than that it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Having lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a replacement for the ones that came in our kids secret agent kiwicrate. The pen that came with that set ran out of ink in only a half hour. I was so glad to find this set for a good price. The ink is truly invisible and the kids use the UV light to help them see while they write as well as reading each other's messages. They are now wanting to mail pens to their cousins and Grandma so that they can start sending each other letters in invisible ink!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bloomer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: These are very cheap. I bought them for my boys and the lights would stop working almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: TNT

customer_reviews.title: Great party favors
customer_reviews.text: The pens were nicely packaged and come in a variety of bright colors. Invisible ink works well and shows up nicely with the light. A few of the lights did not work initially, but started to work after gently twisting the tops near the light. Overall, a fun idea for party favors or an add on to a gift. Kids had fun with them right away!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit at 9 yr old mystery-themed birthday party!
customer_reviews.text: For my daughter's 9th birthday, we did a clue style mystery game in teams. These disappearing ink pen markers were a huge hit! Ahead of time, I wrote out all the clues using the pens and then the teams used their pens throughout the reveal to figure out which party guest committed the crime. They were very excited to take the pen home with them as a souvenir from the party (and even their older high school siblings wanted one too!) Very pleased with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MakoMillerMomma

customer_reviews.title: Basically these are affordable magic wands.
customer_reviews.text: INSTANT WIN There is now writing and drawing probably ALL over our house. But you know what? I can't see it unless I shine a tiny light on it, so I don't care. My kids think this is the best thing ever and they are incredibly good quality for the cost!
customer_reviews.author: C. Crosley

customer_reviews.title: They seem to work well so far
customer_reviews.text: Got these for the kids (10 and 12) as a stocking stuffer this year. The pens arrived promptly and were a good price for the set. Built in UV light seems to work well. Not sure what secret messages the kids are writing to each other, but so far I've seen a lot of happy faces drawn on people's arms. :)
customer_reviews.author: KoldKoffee

customer_reviews.title: BIG HIT!!! 😊
customer_reviews.text: These pens were perfect for my detective theme! I gave these pens to my kids at our open house and they were a hit! I wrote their names in the invisible ink then showed them how to shine the light to reveal their names. They were AMAZED! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lizette

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I used one of these pens for a home made “Escape the Room” for a class I tutor. The ages were 9 to 12 year olds. They LOVED it! It’s awesome that you get the pen and black light in one. I had a feeling the kids would love using this and I was right, they all asked to keep it! Little do they know I bought the pack so I could give them one next week.
customer_reviews.author: K. Herman

customer_reviews.title: make my 8 year old happy
customer_reviews.text: We first purchased this pen at a book fair at my son's school. Of course, he wanted more and we were happy to find them on Amazon. They are truly amazing for keeping 8 year old kids "secrets". Long lasting invisible ink and the lights seem to be pretty resilient as well - given the heavy use. Thank you! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: LIP

customer_reviews.title: Was a hit at a birthday party
customer_reviews.text: All the kids got an invisible disappearing ink pen at the birthday party, and they love them!!! The kids went to an escape room and solved a mystery, then came back to treats and prizes that included the pen. The pens were a great hit! We ordered some extras!
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality
customer_reviews.text: Since I had to give away many of these at a camp i chose these since they were cheaper among their kind. I was a little worried about the quality and some of the wrapping felt sticky for some reason but they all worked fine for their purpose and all kids who received them were thrilled! They had hours of fun with these.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Invisible messages!
customer_reviews.text: This product is just a fun one. You can write secret messages to kids and pretend they are detectives, or a note for a special someone you don’t want anyone else seeing. All in all it’s a great party favor and gift idea. I did notice that the “invisible” ink works best on white paper as opposed to color paper.
customer_reviews.author: Sohellyeah

customer_reviews.title: Just a invisible mess
customer_reviews.text: My pens came in over half were broken! The invisible ink was everywhere and I just ended up throwing the whole package in the trash. I wanted the pink for my daughter... both broken and blue for my son ... only one wasn’t smashed and the other was covered in the ink. A purple was smashed and the black pen.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Party Favors
customer_reviews.text: These were a hit in my son's party bags. Both the kids and adults had fun with them. There's a tab to pull to activate light so the battery doesn't "activate" until you want to start using it. After you activate it, the pen lasts for a long time. My son has been using his for about two months now.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A. Saldana

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These are a Christmas gift for my granddaughter’s. With that said, I can tell you without using them yet they appear to be awesome pens. The quality is excellent, colors are great and each comes with the tab in to indicate the battery has not been used. I’m very excited for the girls to find these in the Christmas stocking!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Invisible Ink impressed my kids!
customer_reviews.text: This was a party favor/tool for a Mystery/Spy party. The girls loved using these to solve clues throughout the party, then tested what messages they could make disappear on different surfaces (everything worked). I was glad to have a 12-pack since the younger siblings were jealous and I could give them their own pens!
customer_reviews.author: KDF

customer_reviews.title: My students couldn't wait to practice spelling with these pens!
customer_reviews.text: As a kid, I was fascinated with the idea of invisible ink. As a teacher of students with Dyslexia, I am constantly looking for ways to make daily dictation more interesting. These pens were a refreshing solution. The pens are colorful and easy to use without having to read instructions. Delivery was extremely fast and communication from the company was consistent throughout the process...from order, to delivery to a courtesy follow-up message. We have only used the pens a few times today (they just arrived yesterday and the kids couldn't wait to use them), but so far the quality seems excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All write the same color.
customer_reviews.text: I was under the mistaken impression that ink from these pens would show up in different colors under the black lights, since the set has 2 of each color pen in it. I was wrong. Some inks look brighter than others, but all the same color. So you get 12 pens in the set that all do about the same thing. They are fun, though!
customer_reviews.author: LEE

customer_reviews.title: Great spy pens
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my granddaughter and she loves them. They are well constructed and each one has a light on the cap. The ink is invisible but shows up well under the light from the cap. I am very happy with my purchase and I will but these again when she runs out.
customer_reviews.author: B. Harms

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit at my daughter's b-day party
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit at my daughter's birthday party. All the 12 and 13 year old girls were having a blast with the pens. Merchandise arrived on time and we didn't have issues with any of the pens not working. I also liked the variety of colors. Just know ahead of time that they all write in the same glow in the dark yellowish ink. Still a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: rodmanizer

customer_reviews.title: Super fun yet inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: These little pens are so fun! Our 6 year old and his friends had a blast writing secret messages and letting everyone else find the paper and what was written. Weeks later they are still having fun with these invisible ink with black light pens. I recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hamaker

customer_reviews.title: Great pens, better price available
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a birthday party, and they were a hit. My son took one to school and came home to inform me that his whole class wants one. Out of curiosity, I checked for a better deal only to realize these specific pens are some of the more expensive ones coming in at basically a dollar a piece.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Mills

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother with these
customer_reviews.text: Of the 12 that come in these pack over 8 of them didn't work after the tab was pulled out to activate the batteries. The light didn't work off the bat and then the pen that you use to write with, the felt on that was frayed. It's a shame because these were favors at my son's birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: Mary. E.

customer_reviews.title: It worked better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: It worked better than I thought. When I was younger invisible pens were more "invisible", because you could still see the indents on the paper. These are more like quick dry markers. No evidence on the paper. I had bought 2 packs for a birthday party, and one had a problem with the cap. But since we ended up not handing out all of them this wasn't an issue
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Cool pen
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty cool pens. Bought for my granddaughter but since she is only 3, will check with late vs if I'm to give but I think it will be fine. You write something and it only shows after you shine the light on it, very cool, sure kids will get a charge out of them
customer_reviews.author: jkantor

customer_reviews.title: Blacklight Party!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my students to use during a blacklight party that we had. They were a HUGE hit! The ink is really vivid under the little UV light that the kids thought was the coolest thing, EVER!!! LOL I will definitely be purchasing some more of these for my class next year!!!
customer_reviews.author: N.L. White

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: They kids had a great time with these writing secret messages. One ran out of ink rather quickly, but the rest were good for a long while. These would be great stocking stuffers or party favors. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jules W.

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: More than enough for everyone to have fun. Many secret messages have been sent with these pens. The lights are great, and the ink has lasted a decent amount of time. The amount of pens in this lot is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Maumauklan

customer_reviews.title: Given as birthday party favor - kids had a blast with them!
customer_reviews.text: These pens worked great. We used them as a party favor of an "escape room" birthday party. The kids had a ton of fun writing secret messages with them (each pen has its own little uv light to light up the writing but we also had a black light set up in a room where they could unveil all drawings and writings at once). Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mathie

customer_reviews.title: Good while they lasted
